original_text: Later on that same day, two of Jesus' disciples were going to a village. The village was called Emmaus. It was about 11 kilometres from Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그 날에 그들 중 둘이 예루살렘에서 이십오 리 되는 엠마오라 하는 마을로 가면서

sentences.original_text: two of Jesus' disciples were going to a village
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님의 제자 두 사람이 마을로 가고 있었다

sentences.original_text: It was about 11 kilometres from Jerusalem
